backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and admin-only property CRUD with IDs and media fields.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module passing old state through unchanged to new actor structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files covering routing, layout, components, hooks, styles, and data modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling defining light/dark theme design tokens and base UI variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up fonts, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root router setup using TanStack Router with routes for Home, Properties, Inquiries, and Admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Admin panel UI for granting and revoking admin access by principal ID with validation and mutation feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapAd: Displays guidance for obtaining admin access and shows the user’s principal with copy support when they are not an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/HomepageAut: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic handling of session resets.
frontend/src/components/auth/MyPrincipal: Shows the authenticated user’s principal ID and lets them copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfoBloc: Component displaying business name, address, and phone with icons.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Renders the homepage hero with marketing text, contact actions, a login button, and a featured image.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Inquir: Implements a client-side inquiry form with validation and simulated submission feedback.
Displays a list of inquiries with contact details and messages, or a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContactBa: Shows quick-access contact and social media buttons with compact and default layouts.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with business info, contact details, hours, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays the site header with navigation, branding, contact bar, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/properties/Inlin: Provides an inline form for creating or editing properties with support for image and video uploads and validation.
frontend/src/components/properties/Prope: Displays property details, media, and admin actions, with editing and delete confirmation handling.
Modal for adding or editing a property, supporting image uploads and form submission.
Image gallery with navigation, error handling, and fallback states for missing or failed images.
Renders a grid of PropertyCard components or a placeholder when no properties exist.
frontend/src/data/siteData.ts: Defines the Property interface, business info, social links, and seeded property data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Provides React Query mutations to grant or revoke admin roles via the backend with normalized error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Implements a placeholder inquiries fetch hook returning an empty list until backend support is restored.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, loading identities, and managing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Custom hook for reading and writing JSON values to localStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePropertyListings.t: Contains property fetching and CRUD mutations using React Query with backend actor calls and error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a hook to check if the current caller is an admin, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page handling authentication, admin checks, error states, and listing inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, service highlights, and an inquiry contact section.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Standalone page displaying the inquiry form with accompanying layout and title.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Renders the properties page with listing display, admin-only CRUD controls, authentication checks, and form handling for creating, updating, and deleting properties.
frontend/src/README-content-transfer.md: Guide explaining how to export business info, properties, and images for transfer to Google Sites.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines simple frontend-only types for user profiles and property inquiry objects.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts an image File to a base64 data URL with type and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/icError.ts: Maps Internet Computer canister errors into normalized, user-friendly error messages with categories.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/src/utils/videoFileToDataUrl.ts: Converts a video File to a base64 data URL with MIME and size checks suitable for IC limits.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Extracts YouTube video IDs, validates YouTube URLs, and generates embed URLs from various YouTube link formats.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current issues, features, and requirements focused on fixing property creation errors and improving video support.
